Summer Kickstart Program

During the Kickstart Program we will work with kids to make sure they are super ready for the start of school. We will test them, and see where problem areas are, and then they will work for up to two hours a day with a tutor. We offer a very low tutor student ratio. Normally 2 students per tutor. After doing this program during the summer, kids start school with so much more confidence, and find themselves at the head of the class.

Summer Schedule 2018

  • July 23-27, 2pm - 4pm
  • July 30 - August 3, 2pm - 4pm
  • July 6-10, 2pm - 4pm

Summer Kickstart

$249 per week
  • Testing included ($50 value!)
  • Multi-week discounts available
  • Ask about a sibling discount also!
